QuestData.Title: Maul Gormal
QuestData.Description: Thanks to you, there's a small militia of farmers hiding nearby. Hanae said something about giving them "liquid courage" which, I'm pretty sure, means they're sauced and ANGRY.$B$BThe mogu think they can walk all over us - we'll give them a fight that will open their eyes.$B$BFollow the trail through the ruins and down to the beach. Find their leader. When you engage him, we'll be there to back you up.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: He would see every last pandaren in chains if he is not stopped.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Subjugator Gormal in Camp Gormal.
QuestData.CompletionText: We are ready to fight the mogu leader whenever you are.
QuestData.RewardText: This is extremely unsettling. If mogu are banding together like this all over the continent, it could become a major threat to Pandaria.
